mainFeature.title: Major Highway Expansion Promises Relief for Subhash Pally Traffic
mainFeature.author: Rohan Mitra
mainFeature.excerpt: A newly approved bypass project aims to divert heavy transport vehicles away from the city core, potentially reducing commute times by 40% for residents of Subhash Pally and Milan Pally.
mainFeature.content:
Traffic Woes Finally Addressed

For years, the residents of Siliguri's central neighborhoods have complained about the relentless flow of semi-trucks rumbling down narrow residential streets. The new 14km bypass, funded jointly by the state and central governments, aims to solve this long-standing issue.

Construction is set to begin next month, with an aggressive timeline aiming for completion before the monsoons next year.
